title: 471.685 LIMIT ON POSTSECONDARY INSTITUTION FEES.
text:
A statutory or home rule charter city, county, or town may not impose a fee, assessment, or similar charge:
(1) on a person, based on the person's status as a student enrolled in a postsecondary educational institution; or
(2) on a postsecondary educational institution, based on the number of students attending the postsecondary institution.
